content.text: I spent my birthday alone, but I still made it a relaxing and enjoyable day.
Oh, that's sad you spent your birthday alone, but I'm glad you made it a relaxing and enjoyable day.
I like to design jewelry to relax, and I prefer to order fast food and have it delivered so I can eat in my room alone.
That sounds really nice. I'm relatively new to the workforce, but I've been at my current job for a few months now.
Oh, that's great! What do you do for work?
I play the piano because it allows me to express myself creatively and connect with others.
That's awesome! I like to work in a craft store.
I grew up with them, and we've been close ever since.
I feel closer to some of my family members than others.
My parents are great, but they don't understand my lifestyle.
I spent my last birthday building a new deck for my house.
Oh, that's really cool! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go on hikes and camping trips.
That sounds really nice. I've always wanted to go on a hike, but I've never had the chance.
You should definitely try it sometime! It's a great way to get out and enjoy nature.
I'll definitely have to try it sometime.
I'm glad we're getting to know each other a little better.
Me too! This is a lot of fun.
